bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Etiological Agent. of a depletion of body liquids and dryness, and hence causes in the birth canal a roughness that cannot be smoothed, which in turn brings about difficult births, the inability of a dead fetus to pass down, or constipation. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 43: 穢 露早下，致子道乾澀，產婦力疲，皆令難也 , “If water breaks too early this may make the birth canal desiccated and rough , so that giving birth requires strength and is tiring. All this makes [birth] more difficult”.
